name: market for technical wood drying facility | technical wood drying facility | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/6050/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This is the market for  'technical wood drying facility', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the construction of technical wood drying facility. The facility includes a kiln with a capacity of 30 m3 wood per charge and a drying time depending on the wood type. The service life is assumed to be 50 years. The process includes land area, building materials, decommission of a kiln, but land used for storage is excluded.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
